## About Support & Issues

AIMMS is an independently developed, one-time purchase application.

GitHub Issues are provided as a place to:
- Report bugs
- Suggest improvements
- Document edge cases

Please note:
- There is no guaranteed support or response time
- Issues are addressed when time permits
- Not all issues or requests will be responded to or resolved

Thank you for understanding and for keeping reports clear and concise.
